title: Black Left-Pointing Double Triangle

verbs: To wind (a tape, cassette, or film, etc) towards the beginning; to rewind.
To wind a magnetic tape spool or cassette to its beginning.
nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

description: Two triangles pointing to the left. Most commonly used as a symbol¬†for rewinding media such as video tapes, CDs, or digital audio and video.
apple_vendor_description: The fast reverse button emoji on Apple devices is a sleek, dark icon with a subtle 3D effect, appearing as if pressed into a glossy surface. Its sharp, clean lines and precise curves are characteristic of Apple's user interface design, providing a clear visual cue for rewinding content. On Apple devices, this emoji is instinctively understood to mean going back, reversing playback, or undoing an action in digital communication.
